actions.recommendation: Its not too late to stop smoking!
actions.source_field: Overview Notes: FEV1 is 70.3%. The ratio between this and your forced vital capacity is 70% (normal 70 to 80%). Any lower and you are in the zone for emphysema.

actions.recommendation: Please book a consult to discuss these results.
actions.source_field: Overview Notes: Your red blood cells are large - this does mean you should come in to do iron studies , vitamin b12 levels and folate studies.
Overview Notes: Exercises; Good social connections

actions.recommendation: Abnormal lung function tests and abnormal chest measurements
actions.source_field: Overview Notes: Abnormal lung function tests and abnormal chest measurements
